articles.title: Ukraine war: Fighter ace and two other pilots killed in mid-air crash

articles.description: A man opened fire and barricaded himself in a store before being shot dead by police, reports say.
articles.title: Jacksonville shooting: Several dead at Dollar General store in Florida

articles.description: The injured include 26 firefighters sent to a stricken liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) station near Bucharest.
articles.title: Huge blasts at Romania fuel station kill one and injure dozens

articles.description: Fires in western Canada have burned homes and ripped up trees, laying them down "like toothpicks".
articles.title: The indiscriminate devastation of Canada's raging wildfires

articles.description: Mnangagwa is only Zimbabwe's second president, after he outmanoeuvred long-time ruler Robert Mugabe in a 2017 coup.
articles.title: Emmerson Mnangagwa: 'The Crocodile' wins second term as Zimbabwe president

articles.description: Casings and coins at a site in central France suggest prisoners were shot by the French Resistance after D-Day.
articles.title: Evidence found of German mass execution by French Resistance after D-Day

articles.description: Civil rights activists and Martin Luther King Jr's family spoke at the event in Washington DC.
articles.title: Thousands mark 60 years since 'I have a dream' speech

articles.description: Spain's Women's World Cup-winning head coach Jorge Vilda has called the moment Luis Rubiales kissed squad member Jennifer Hermoso "inappropriate and unacceptable".
articles.title: Spain boss Vilda criticises 'inappropriate' Rubiales

articles.description: Thieves climbed to an altitude of 2,350m and traversed gorges - all to rob a collection box.

articles.description: Barker was the face of The Price Is Right, the longest-running game show in the US, for 35 years.
